entries.journal_entry_description: Kinesworthy suspects that Treun Lorn has been working on a project for years in the Deep Depths. The doctor wants whatever piece you can salvage from his projects. No one knows what could be waiting in the shadows of the Deep Depths.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find Lorn's Workshop in the Myyydril Caverns and destroy the NK-3.
